Others: The Warriors became the first team to win in Boston in the regular season since the New York Knicks on April 11.
Curry scored a season-high 27 points and dished out nine assists against the Celtics.
Hield is on the best heater of his career with a 50.7 percent success rate from three-point range on 9.1 attempts per game.
The Warriors rank second in defensive rating, third in offensive rating and first in net rating.
